summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 6, Block 1, Thompson's University Addition; Lots 1, 2, 3, 28, 29 and 30, Blocks 1 and 2, Barron Addition; the east 48 feet of Lot 6, Block 15, Baltimore Addition; the west one-half of Lots 3, 4, and 5, Block 1, University Heights Addition; and Lot 1, Block 2, Spreutel's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-236 and 17-182, respectively.
